mapper.sql: UUID, CREATETIME, CHECKTIME, STARTTIME, ENDTIME, TYPE, CREATER, CHECKER, STARTER, ENDER, SUPPLIERUUID, TOTALMONEY, STATE, WAYBILLSN
mapper.insert: insert into orders (UUID, CREATETIME, CHECKTIME, STARTTIME, ENDTIME, TYPE, CREATER, CHECKER, STARTER, ENDER, SUPPLIERUUID, TOTALMONEY, STATE, WAYBILLSN) values (#{uuid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{checktime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{creater,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{checker,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{starter,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ender,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{supplieruuid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalmoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{state,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{waybillsn,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

mapper.update:
update orders
CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CHECKTIME = #{checktime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STARTTIME = #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ENDTIME = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CHECKER = #{checker,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STARTER = #{starter,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ENDER = #{ender,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SUPPLIERUUID = #{supplieruuid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TOTALMONEY = #{totalmoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STATE = #{state,jdbcType=CHAR},
WAYBILLSN = #{waybillsn,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where UUID = #{uuid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update orders set CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CHECKTIME = #{checktime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STARTTIME = #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ENDTIME = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CHECKER = #{checker,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STARTER = #{starter,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ENDER = #{ender,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SUPPLIERUUID = #{supplieruuid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TOTALMONEY = #{totalmoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STATE = #{state,jdbcType=CHAR}, WAYBILLSN = #{waybillsn,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where UUID = #{uuid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
